original_text: ‘The Lord, Israel's God, says this to the people: I made a covenant with your ancestors when I brought them out of Egypt. They had been slaves when they were there.
korean_text: 이스라엘 하나님 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 내가 너희 선조를 애굽 땅 종의 집에서 인도하여 낼 때에 그들과 언약을 맺으며 이르기를

sentences.original_text: The Lord, Israel's God, says this to the people:
sentences.korean_translation: 주, 이스라엘의 하나님이 백성에게 이렇게 말씀하신다:

sentences.original_text: I made a covenant with your ancestors
when I brought them out of Egypt.
